LanguageData.Door.label: двері
LanguageData.Door.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.Door_Blueprint.label: door (blueprint)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.label: door (building)
LanguageData.Door_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.Autodoor.label: автоматичні двері
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: Розділяє кімнати. Автоматичне відкривання дозволяє людям переміщуватись між кімнатами без перешкод.
LanguageData.Autodoor_Blueprint.label: autodoor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.label: autodoor (building)
LanguageData.Autodoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Wall.label: стіна
LanguageData.Wall.description: Стіна, крізь яку персонажі не можуть проходити. Може тримати на собі дах.
LanguageData.Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
